title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python apps with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package enabling Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI) with model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with prompts history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, embeddings, fine-tuning, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and rate limiting.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bringing Ollama chat to servers with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for summarizing notes and Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library providing idiomatic structs and helpers for the Ollama API.
